sense.gloss: leftovers, remainder, pickings, odds and ends
student who cannot keep up in school, dropout (from school, society, a movement, etc.)

sdata.j: クリスは↑理科↑↓りか↓の↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓で|↑落↑↓お↓ちこぼれ|そうです。
sdata.e: Chris is in a risky situation in science class.

sdata.j: タクシー↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑手↑↓しゅ↓になった↑東大↑↓とうだい↓↑卒↑↓そつ↓の↑木村↑↓きむら↓さんは↑誰↑↓だれ↓かの↑物指↑↓ものさ↓しで、|↑落↑↓お↓ちこぼれ|なのかもしれないけど、↑運転↑↓うんてん↓↑好↑↓す↓きならいいんじゃないかな。
sdata.e: Kimura is a Tokyo university graduate who became a taxi driver. According to some people's standards, he might be considered a failure, but I think it's fine as long as he likes driving.

sdata.j: クリスは↑理科↑↓りか↓の↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓で|↑落↑↓お↓ちこぼれ|そうです。
sdata.e: Chris risks falling behind in the science class.
